Name: Heart of Depth
Title: Shipborne Afterthought: Heart of Depth
Desc: "For all deaths are in vain. There is no saving those who indulge in the past."

Talent.Name: Heart of Depth
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be {SPRITE_PRESET#1102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
